item.title: CVE-2024-3602|2024-06-20T02:08:19.025Z -- promolayerpopupbuilder -- pop%20ups%2C%20exit%20intent%20popups%2C%20email%20popups%2C%20banners%2C%20bars%2C%20countdowns%20and%20cart%20savers%20%E2%80%93%20promolayer
item.description: The Pop ups, Exit intent popups, email popups, banners, bars, countdowns and cart savers â€“ Promolayer plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized plugin settings update due to a missing capability check on the disconnect_promolayer function in all versions up to, and including, 1.1.0. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber access or higher, to remove the Promolayer connection.
